entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story. He is a student at Hogwarts and has plans for Ginny.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: A female character in the story who Harry has plans for.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: A rival student at Hogwarts who is spending time within the Room of Requirement.

entities.name: felix felicis
entities.description: A magical potion that gives the drinker good luck.

relationships.description: Harry has plans for Ginny and is hoping to win the game so he can celebrate with her.
Harry and Malfoy are rivals at Hogwarts, and Harry is trying to figure out what Malfoy is up to in the Room of Requirement.
